epics.title: Enterprise Authentication and Access Management
epics.summary: Integrate enterprise authentication and implement role-based access control
epics.description: Develop a secure login mechanism integrated with enterprise identity providers using protocols such as SAML, OAuth2, or OpenID Connect. Implement role-based access control (RBAC) to ensure users access only authorized resources and data. Enforce tenant isolation to maintain separation of data across multiple organizations while providing a seamless user experience.

epics.title: Multi-Cloud Account Onboarding and API Integration
epics.summary: Enable onboarding of AWS, Azure, GCP, and IBM Cloud accounts with secure API integration
epics.description: Design and implement workflows for securely onboarding cloud accounts across multiple providers. Integrate with AWS, Azure, GCP, and IBM Cloud APIs to validate credentials, set permissions, and securely manage secrets or tokens. Ensure consistent validation, error handling, and audit logging throughout the onboarding process.

epics.title: Resource Discovery and Data Normalization
epics.summary: Automatically discover resources and normalize multi-cloud data for unified analysis
epics.description: Build automated discovery mechanisms using provider APIs to continuously identify and update cloud resources. Normalize asset data into a consistent schema to enable unified reporting and visualization. Ensure discovery runs at scheduled intervals or on-demand, maintaining accuracy even with frequent resource changes.

epics.title: Single-Pane Dashboard and Visualization
epics.summary: Develop an interactive, personalized dashboard showing cloud inventory, cost, security, and compliance insights
epics.description: Create a dynamic user interface that consolidates cross-provider insights into a unified dashboard. Display real-time data on resource inventory, spending, security posture, and compliance metrics. Support customization based on user role and preferences, with filters, drill-downs, and visual widgets for actionable insights.

epics.title: Cost Analysis and Optimization Engine
epics.summary: Aggregate cloud billing data and provide cost optimization strategies
epics.description: Integrate with cloud billing APIs to collect and consolidate cost data across providers. Analyze spending patterns, detect anomalies, and identify savings opportunities such as unused resources or rightsizing options. Provide configurable reports and visualizations that help organizations monitor budgets and plan cloud expenditures effectively.

epics.title: Security Posture and Compliance Assessment
epics.summary: Implement a compliance engine for real-time security and compliance posture evaluation
epics.description: Develop a compliance assessment module with rule-based checks aligned to best practices and regulatory standards such as CIS, ISO 27001, and NIST. Continuously assess resource configurations and generate findings with severity levels and recommended remediations. Integrate with native cloud security APIs to enhance coverage and provide consolidated compliance reporting.

epics.title: Governance Automation and CI/CD Integration
epics.summary: Enable policy-driven automation workflows via CI/CD and IaC tools
epics.description: Integrate governance automation workflows with CI/CD pipelines and Infrastructure-as-Code tools such as Terraform, Jenkins, and GitLab CI. Provide mechanisms to trigger automated environment creation, tagging enforcement, or policy remediation actions based on defined security or compliance events. Ensure auditability and reversibility of automated actions.

epics.title: Real-Time Alerts and Notifications
epics.summary: Implement an alerting framework for costs, security, and compliance events
epics.description: Build an event-driven alerting and notification system that provides real-time updates on cost spikes, security threats, and compliance violations. Support multi-channel delivery including email, chat, and webhooks. Allow customizable thresholds, escalation rules, and suppression policies to reduce noise and ensure timely response.

epics.title: Audit Trail and Activity Logging
epics.summary: Establish full auditing and history tracking for all platform activities
epics.description: Implement an immutable audit logging system that records every user action, system event, and workflow execution. Store metadata such as timestamps, action details, and actor information in a secure and queryable format. Support retention policies and export options to facilitate compliance and investigations.

epics.title: Scalability, Performance, and Resilience Enhancements
epics.summary: Optimize system design for scalability, uptime, and high performance
epics.description: Architect and optimize the platform to scale efficiently with user growth and multi-cloud data volumes. Implement load balancing, caching, asynchronous processing, and horizontal scaling mechanisms. Ensure robust performance monitoring, disaster recovery strategies, and fault-tolerant design to deliver consistent performance under varying workloads.

user_stories.title: Integrate with Enterprise Identity Providers
user_stories.description: As a security engineer, I want to integrate with enterprise identity providers (e.g., SAML, OAuth, LDAP), so that users can securely authenticate using their enterprise credentials.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Must support SAML, OAuth, LDAP integrations; Ensure secure data handling.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Integration with SAML, OAuth, LDAP verified in test environment; Users authenticate using enterprise credentials.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a configured identity provider, When a user attempts to authenticate, Then the system validates credentials and grants access according to RBAC rules.

user_stories.title: Implement Role-Based Access Control (RBAC)
user_stories.description: As a system administrator, I want to implement role-based access control (RBAC), so that users can only access resources based on their roles and permissions.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Define roles and permissions; Ensure only authorized access to resources.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Roles and permissions set up; Users restricted to role-permitted actions.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a user with a specific role, When the user tries to access a resource, Then the system grants or denies access based on assigned permissions.

user_stories.title: Implement Tenant Isolation
user_stories.description: As a system architect, I want to implement tenant isolation, so that user data is securely segregated in a multi-tenant environment.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Ensure data isolation per tenant; Prevent cross-tenant data access.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Data segregated per tenant; Verified and tested for isolation compliance.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a multi-tenant system, When a user from tenant A accesses the system, Then the user should only see and interact with tenant A's data.

user_stories.title: Design Onboarding Workflows for Cloud Providers
user_stories.description: As a cloud engineer, I want to design onboarding workflows for AWS, Azure, GCP, and IBM Cloud, so that new accounts can be integrated smoothly.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Onboarding workflows designed and tested for AWS, Azure, GCP, and IBM Cloud.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a new cloud account, When an onboarding process is initiated, Then the system stores credentials securely and validates permissions.

user_stories.title: Establish API Integration with Cloud Providers
user_stories.description: As a software integrator, I want to establish reliable API integration with supported cloud providers, so that seamless connectivity is ensured.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Support APIs for AWS, Azure, GCP, IBM Cloud; Handle integration errors gracefully.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: API integrations established and validated; Error handling implemented.
user_stories.test_cases: Given API credentials, When connecting to a cloud provider, Then the system ensures a reliable connection and handles errors gracefully.

user_stories.title: Develop Automated Discovery Mechanisms
user_stories.description: As a cloud operations manager, I want to develop automated discovery mechanisms, so that cloud resources are fetched and updated periodically.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Use cloud APIs; Ensure resiliency during API failures; Sync periodically.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Automated discovery implemented for multiple providers; Periodic sync and delta updates verified.
user_stories.test_cases: Given configured API credentials, When discovery is triggered, Then resources are fetched, updated, and resiliency to API failures is ensured.

user_stories.title: Normalize Discovered Data
user_stories.description: As a data architect, I want to normalize discovered cloud resource data, so that it conforms to a common schema for unified reporting.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Normalize data from multiple cloud providers; Ensure data consistency.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Cloud resource data normalized; Unified schema established.
user_stories.test_cases: Given discovered data, When normalization is applied, Then the data conforms to the common unified schema.

user_stories.title: Develop Frontend Dashboard
user_stories.description: As a product manager, I want to develop a frontend dashboard that presents cloud resources, costs, security posture, and compliance metrics, so that users have a unified view of their cloud environments.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Provide role-based views; Include filtering, search, and visualization widgets.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Dashboard developed with interactive widgets; Views tailored by user roles.
user_stories.test_cases: Given specific user roles, When accessing the dashboard, Then users see tailored views of cloud data and can interact with widgets.

user_stories.title: Implement Drill-Down Capabilities
user_stories.description: As a data analyst, I want to implement drill-down capabilities for the dashboard, so that users can explore data in detail by cloud, region, or service.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Support data exploration by different dimensions; Ensure responsive performance.
user_stories.test_cases: Given the dashboard, When a user drills down by cloud, region, or service, Then detailed data is presented without performance degradation.
